attributes.action: Give more thought to our Forces past and present
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of our Forces that have served this country,are forgotten, some that served for 10 years or more (and paid national insurance)do not get a pension,M.P.s get a pension for only serving a short time which is more substantial than most get.  It is about time that our Forces that served this Country are given some thought

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
